TopicTitle: How to Get Astronomer's Visual Pack Running

Articles.Content:
I Downloaded **Astronomer's Visual Pack** - Interstellar V2

and when I opened the zip I didn't find what any mod have it was like option 2 and many useless files

can anyone help me I will be so thankful

> 
> I Downloaded **Astronomer's Visual Pack** - Interstellar V2
> and when I opened the zip I didn't find what any mod have it was like option 2 and many useless files
> 
> can anyone help me I will be so thankful

Wouldn't it be better if you posted this on the [thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102145-0-25-Astronomer-s-Visual-Pack-Interstellar-V2)/looked through the thread yourself to see if someone had already posted how?

> 
> Wouldn't it be better if you posted this on the thread/looked through the thread yourself to see if someone had already posted how?

I looked

The files are not useless.

Read the directory and file names, they are the documentation.
